divs: Sighting Detailsenjoying the weather on deck , looked up and there it was , new it wasn't an airplane , looked like a huge cigar glowing cylinder fling real low fast and smooth turn on a dime straight west and was gone in 4 seconds , shocked still shocked was out to my cousins today we were still wandering what we saw sped up and was gone
Summary: setting on deck look at the very blue sky there it was going south , ask cousin what it was said wow watch for seconds turned west and excellerated gone
trends: There have been no other sightings in Union City
This sighting has never been favorited.
